Manuscript is in preparation. 

<b>Citation:</b><br>

<i>A Donath, F Jühling, M Al-Arab, SH Bernhart, F. Reinhardt, PF Stadler, M Middendorf, M Bernt</i><br>
<b>Improved annotation of protein-coding genes boundaries in metazoan mitochondrial genomes</b><br>
